name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ImportAware - Shop Smarter on Amazon with Country of Origin Insights

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to identify and suggest alternatives for products on Amazon from countries you would prefer to not support.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing ImportAware, the game-changing Chrome extension that empowers you to make informed decisions while shopping on Amazon. With ImportAware, you can easily see the country of origin for products, giving you the transparency you need to support the countries and manufacturers you trust.

Key Features:

- Country of Origin Display: ImportAware shows you the country of origin for products on Amazon, when available (currently for Amazon US only).
- Customizable Deny List: Add countries to your personal deny list, and ImportAware will alert you when you visit a product page from a denied country.
- Smart Alternatives: When a product is from a country on your deny list, ImportAware automatically recommends alternative products from countries you trust.
- Preset Country Lists: Get started quickly with four different preset lists of countries, or create your own custom list tailored to your preferences.

In today's global marketplace, it's more important than ever to know where your products come from. ImportAware gives you the power to support countries and manufacturers that align with your values, helping you shop smarter and more consciously on Amazon.

Please note that ImportAware is currently in its early beta stage, and we're actively seeking feedback from our community of users. Your input is invaluable in shaping the future of this extension, and we encourage you to share your thoughts, suggestions, and experiences with us. Together, we can make ImportAware an even more powerful tool for informed shopping on Amazon.

Install ImportAware today and take control of your Amazon shopping experience. Make a positive impact with every purchase, knowing that you have the information you need to support the countries and manufacturers you believe in.

We're excited to have you join the ImportAware community and look forward to your feedback as we continue to improve and expand this game-changing extension.

**Disclosure: ImportAware may use affiliate links, which means we may earn a small commission if you make a purchase through our links. This helps support the development and improvement of the extension at no extra cost to you.
